2170.SR.summary: Alujain Holding Corporation manufactures and sells home care products in Saudi Arabia. It operates in two segments, Investments and Manufacturing Home-Care Products. The company offers home care products, such as spray starches and air fresheners; insecticides; and agricultural pesticides. It also manufactures petrochemical products. The company was formerly known as Alujain Corporation and changed its name to Alujain Holding Corporation in February 2020. Alujain Holding Corporation was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
